trans-unit.source: Test-Driven Development (TDD) and Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) are approaches of developing software by describing behavior of a piece of code or the whole feature as a set of scenarios or tests before writing actual code and only then creating the implementation that allows these tests to pass verifying that intended behavior is achieved.
trans-unit.target: 测试驱动开发(TDD)和行为驱动开发(BDD)是开发软件的方法,在编写实际代码之前,将一段代码或整个功能的行为描述为一组场景或测试,然后创建允许这些测试通过的实现,以验证预期行为的实现。

trans-unit.target: Testing

trans-unit.target: 对数组进行测试

trans-unit.source: Testing and debugging

trans-unit.source: Testing is an important part of software development. Whether we are aware of it or not, we conduct testing continuously. For example, when we write a class in PHP, we may debug it step by step or simply use echo or die statements to verify the implementation works according to our initial plan. In the case of a web application, we're entering some test data in forms to ensure the page interacts with us as expected.
trans-unit.target: 测试是软件开发的重要组成部分。不管我们是否意识到，我们都会不断进行测试。例如，当我们用PHP编写类时，我们可以逐步调试它，或者简单地使用 echo 或 die 语句来验证实现是否符合我们的初始计划。对于Web应用程序，我们以表格形式输入一些测试数据，以确保页面按预期与我们交互。

trans-unit.source: That is, enclose content generation logic in a pair of beginCache() and endCache() calls. If the content is found in the cache, beginCache() will render the cached content and return false, thus skip the content generation logic. Otherwise, your content generation logic will be called, and when endCache() is called, the generated content will be captured and stored in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，将内容生成逻辑包含在一对beginCache（）和endCache（）调用中。如果在缓存中找到内容，则beginCache（）将呈现缓存的内容并返回 false ，从而跳过内容生成逻辑。否则，将调用您的内容生成逻辑，并且在调用endCache（）时，将捕获所生成的内容并将其存储在缓存中。

trans-unit.source: That's the basic idea. One can say that logging user out is nothing serious, but bad guys can do much more, using this idea. Imagine that some website has an URL http://an.example.com/purse/transfer?to=anotherUser&amount=2000. Accessing it using GET request, causes transfer of $2000 from authorized user account to user anotherUser. We know, that browser will always send GET request to load an image, so we can modify code to accept only POST requests on that URL. Unfortunately, this will not save us, because an attacker can put some JavaScript code instead of <img> tag, which allows to send POST requests on that URL.
trans-unit.target: 这是基本思想。可以说，注销用户并没有什么大不了的，但是坏家伙可以利用这一想法做更多的事情。假设某个网站的URL为 http://an.example.com/purse/transfer?to=anotherUser&amount=2000 。使用GET请求访问它，将导致$ 2000从授权用户帐户转移到用户 anotherUser 。我们知道，浏览器将始终发送GET请求以加载图像，因此我们可以修改代码以仅接受该URL上的POST请求。不幸的是，这不能挽救我们，因为攻击者可以放置一些JavaScript代码而不是 <img> 标签，该标签允许在该URL上发送POST请求。

trans-unit.source: The "Entity Tag" (or ETag for short) header use a hash to represent the content of a page. If the page is changed, the hash will be changed as well. By comparing the hash kept on the client-side with the hash generated on the server-side, the cache may determine whether the page has been changed and should be re-transmitted.
trans-unit.target: “实体标签”（或简称为 ETag ）标头使用哈希表示网页的内容。如果页面被更改，则哈希也将被更改。通过将保留在客户端的哈希值与在服务器端生成的哈希值进行比较，缓存可以确定页面是否已更改并且应该重新发送。

trans-unit.source: The "data" attribute is specially handled when it is receiving an array value. In this case, the array will be "expanded" and a list data attributes will be rendered. For example, if 'data' => ['id' => 1, 'name' => 'yii'], then this will be rendered: data-id="1" data-name="yii". Additionally 'data' => ['params' => ['id' => 1, 'name' => 'yii'], 'status' => 'ok'] will be rendered as: data-params='{"id":1,"name":"yii"}' data-status="ok".
trans-unit.target: 接收数组值时，将特别处理“数据”属性。在这种情况下，数组将被“扩展”，并且将呈现列表数据属性。例如，如果 'data' => ['id' => 1, 'name' => 'yii'] ，则将呈现此 data-id="1" data-name="yii" ：data-id =“ 1” data-name =“ yii”。另外， 'data' => ['params' => ['id' => 1, 'name' => 'yii'], 'status' => 'ok'] 将被呈现为： data-params='{"id":1,"name":"yii"}' data-status="ok" 。

trans-unit.source: The isolation level to use for this transaction. If not specified (null) the isolation level will not be set explicitly and the DBMS default will be used.

trans-unit.source: The PHP intl extension is based on the ICU library which provides the knowledge and formatting rules for all different locales. Different versions of ICU may produce different formatting result of date and number values. To ensure your website produces the same results across all environments, it is recommended that you install the same version of the intl extension (and thus the same version of ICU) in all environments.
trans-unit.target: 在PHP扩展国际基于对ICU库提供所有不同的区域设置的知识和格式规则。不同版本的ICU可能会产生不同的日期和数字值格式结果。为了确保您的网站在所有环境中都能产生相同的结果，建议您在所有环境中安装相同版本的 intl 扩展名（以及相同版本的ICU）。

trans-unit.source: The basePath property is often used to derive other important paths (e.g. the runtime path). For this reason, a path alias named @app is predefined to represent this path. Derived paths may then be formed using this alias (e.g. @app/runtime to refer to the runtime directory).
trans-unit.target: 的基本路径属性经常被用于导出其它重要路径（例如运行时间路径）。因此，预定义了名为 @app 的路径别名以表示该路径。然后可以使用该别名（例如， @app/runtime 引用运行时目录）来形成派生路径。

trans-unit.source: The basePath property specifies the root directory of an application. It is the directory that contains all protected source code of an application system. Under this directory, you normally will see sub-directories such as models, views, and controllers, which contain source code corresponding to the MVC pattern.
trans-unit.target: 的基本路径属性指定的应用程序的根目录下。它是包含应用程序系统所有受保护源代码的目录。在此目录下，通常会看到子目录，例如 models ， views 和 controllers ，其中包含与MVC模式相对应的源代码。

trans-unit.source: The id property specifies a unique ID that differentiates an application from others. It is mainly used programmatically. Although not a requirement, for best interoperability it is recommended that you use only alphanumeric characters when specifying an application ID.
trans-unit.target: 该ID属性指定一个唯一的ID区别于其他的应用程序。它主要以编程方式使用。尽管不是必需的，但是为了获得最佳的互操作性，建议您在指定应用程序ID时仅使用字母数字字符。

trans-unit.source: The modules property takes an array of module configurations. Each array key represents a module ID which uniquely identifies the module among all modules in the application, and the corresponding array value is a configuration for creating the module.
trans-unit.target: 所述模块属性采用模块配置的阵列。每个阵列键代表一个模块ID，该ID在应用程序中所有模块中唯一地标识该模块，并且相应的阵列值是用于创建该模块的配置。

trans-unit.target: 在创建和配置控制器之后，将调用yii \ base \ Controller :: init（）方法。

trans-unit.source: The yii\base\Theme::$pathMap property governs how view files should be replaced. It takes an array of key-value pairs, where the keys are the original view paths to be replaced and the values are the corresponding themed view paths. The replacement is based on partial match: if a view path starts with any key in the pathMap array, that matching part will be replaced with the corresponding array value. Using the above configuration example, because @app/views/site/about.php partially matches the key @app/views, it will be replaced as @app/themes/basic/site/about.php.
trans-unit.target: 该警予\基地\主题:: $路径映射属性控制视图文件应该如何进行更换。它采用一组键值对，其中键是要替换的原始视图路径，而值是相应的主题视图路径。替换基于部分匹配：如果视图路径以pathMap数组中的任何键开头，则该匹配部分将替换为相应的数组值。使用上面的配置示例，由于 @app/views/site/about.php 部分匹配键 @app/views ，它将被替换为 @app/themes/basic/site/about.php 。

trans-unit.source: The view component provides the params property that you can use to share data among views.
trans-unit.target: 该视图组件提供了PARAMS属性，您可以在视图中使用共享数据。

trans-unit.source: The renderDynamic() method takes a piece of PHP code as its parameter. The return value of the PHP code is treated as the dynamic content. The same PHP code will be executed for every request, no matter the enclosing fragment is being served from cached or not.
trans-unit.target: 所述renderDynamic（）方法采用一块PHP代码作为其参数。PHP代码的返回值被视为动态内容。无论封闭的片段是否由缓存提供，每个请求都将执行相同的PHP代码。

trans-unit.source: The render() and renderFile() methods will use this view object to implement the actual view rendering. If not set, it will default to the "view" application component.
trans-unit.target: 该渲染（）和RenderFile模块（）方法将使用此视图对象实现实际的视图渲染。如果未设置，它将默认为“视图”应用程序组件。

trans-unit.source: The Yii::createObject() method is implemented based on a dependency injection container. It allows you to specify a set of the so-called default configurations which will be applied to ALL instances of the specified classes when they are being created using Yii::createObject(). The default configurations can be specified by calling Yii::$container->set() in the bootstrapping code.
trans-unit.target: 所述的Yii ::的CreateObject（）方法是基于一个上实现依赖注入容器。它允许您指定一组所谓的默认配置，当使用Yii :: createObject（）创建指定类的所有实例时，这些默认配置将应用于它们。可以通过在引导代码中调用 Yii::$container->set() 来指定默认配置。

trans-unit.source: The Yii::createObject() method takes a configuration array as its argument, and creates an object by instantiating the class named in the configuration. When the object is instantiated, the rest of the configuration will be used to initialize the object's properties, event handlers, and behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 所述的Yii ::的CreateObject（）方法以一个配置数组作为它的参数，并通过实例在配置命名为类创建一个对象。实例化对象时，其余配置将用于初始化对象的属性，事件处理程序和行为。

trans-unit.source: The link() method requires you to specify the relation name and the target Active Record instance that the relationship should be established with. The method will modify the values of the attributes that link two Active Record instances and save them to the database. In the above example, it will set the customer_id attribute of the Order instance to be the value of the id attribute of the Customer instance and then save it to the database.
trans-unit.target: 该链接（）方法需要您指定的关系名称和关系应该建立在目标活动记录实例。该方法将修改链接两个Active Record实例的属性的值，并将它们保存到数据库中。在上面的示例中，它将把 Order 实例的 customer_id 属性设置为 Customer 实例的 id 属性的值，然后将其保存到数据库中。

trans-unit.source: The save() method can either insert or update a row of data, depending on the state of the Active Record instance. If the instance is newly created via the new operator, calling save() will cause insertion of a new row; If the instance is the result of a query method, calling save() will update the row associated with the instance.

trans-unit.source: The categories property takes an array consisting of message category names or patterns. A target will only process messages whose category can be found or match one of the patterns in this array. A category pattern is a category name prefix with an asterisk * at its end. A category name matches a category pattern if it starts with the same prefix of the pattern. For example, yii\db\Command::execute and yii\db\Command::query are used as category names for the log messages recorded in the yii\db\Command class. They both match the pattern yii\db\*.
trans-unit.target: 所述类别属性采用由消息类别名称或图案的阵列。目标将仅处理其类别可以找到或与该数组中的模式之一匹配的消息。类别模式是类别名称前缀，其末尾带有星号 * 。如果类别名称以相同的模式前缀开头，则它与类别模式匹配。例如， yii\db\Command::execute 和 yii\db\Command::query 用作yii \ db \ Command类中记录的日志消息的类别名称。它们都与 yii\db\* 模式匹配。

trans-unit.source: The error handler adjusts the error display according to the value of the constant YII_DEBUG. When YII_DEBUG is true (meaning in debug mode), the error handler will display exceptions with detailed call stack information and source code lines to help easier debugging. And when YII_DEBUG is false, only the error message will be displayed to prevent revealing sensitive information about the application.
trans-unit.target: 的错误处理程序根据该常数的值的误差调整显示 YII_DEBUG 。当 YII_DEBUG 为 true （在调试模式下表示意思）时，错误处理程序将显示带有详细的调用堆栈信息和源代码行的异常，以帮助简化调试。当 YII_DEBUG 为 false 时，将仅显示错误消息，以防止泄露有关该应用程序的敏感信息。

trans-unit.source: The error handler is enabled by default. You may disable it by defining the constant YII_ENABLE_ERROR_HANDLER to be false in the entry script of your application.

trans-unit.source: The yii\web\User::login() method sets the identity of the current user to the yii\web\User. If session is enabled, it will keep the identity in the session so that the user authentication status is maintained throughout the whole session. If cookie-based login (i.e. "remember me" login) is enabled, it will also save the identity in a cookie so that the user authentication status can be recovered from the cookie as long as the cookie remains valid.
trans-unit.target: 所述YII \幅\用户::登录（）方法将当前用户的身份YII \网络\用户。如果启用了 session ，它将在会话中保留身份，以便在整个会话中保持用户身份验证状态。如果启用了基于cookie的登录（即“记住我”登录），则还将身份存储在cookie中，以便只要cookie保持有效，就可以从cookie中恢复用户身份验证状态。

trans-unit.source: The DetailView widget displays the details of a single data model.

trans-unit.source: The ListView widget is used to display data from a data provider. Each data model is rendered using the specified view file. Since it provides features such as pagination, sorting and filtering out of the box, it is handy both to display information to end user and to create data managing UI.

trans-unit.source: The Connection component supports load balancing and failover between slaves. When performing a read query for the first time, the Connection component will randomly pick a slave and try connecting to it. If the slave is found "dead", it will try another one. If none of the slaves is available, it will connect to the master. By configuring a server status cache, a "dead" server can be remembered so that it will not be tried again during a certain period of time.
trans-unit.target: 所述 Connection 部件支持负载平衡和故障转移从站之间。首次执行读取查询时， Connection 组件将随机选择一个从属并尝试连接到该从属。如果发现从站“死”，它将尝试另一个。如果没有任何一个从站可用，它将连接到主站。通过配置服务器状态缓存，可以记住“死”服务器，以便在一定时间内不会再次尝试。

trans-unit.source: The GET parameter view tells yii\web\ViewAction which view is requested. The action will then look for this view under the directory @app/views/site/pages. You may configure yii\web\ViewAction::$viewPrefix to change the directory for searching these views.
trans-unit.target: 该 GET 参数 view 告诉警予\网络\ ViewAction这一哪种观点被请求。然后，该操作将在目录 @app/views/site/pages 下寻找该视图。您可以配置yii \ web \ ViewAction :: $ viewPrefix来更改用于搜索这些视图的目录。

trans-unit.source: The Last-Modified header uses a timestamp to indicate if the page has been modified since the client caches it.

trans-unit.source: The Formatter class is designed to format values according to a $locale. For this feature to work the PHP intl extension has to be installed. Most of the methods however work also if the PHP intl extension is not installed by providing a fallback implementation. Without intl month and day names are in English only. Note that even if the intl extension is installed, formatting date and time values for years >=2038 or <=1901 on 32bit systems will fall back to the PHP implementation because intl uses a 32bit UNIX timestamp internally. On a 64bit system the intl formatter is used in all cases if installed.
trans-unit.target: Formatter类旨在根据$ locale格式化值。为了使此功能正常工作，必须安装PHP intl扩展。但是，如果未通过提供后备实现来安装PHP intl扩展，则大多数方法也可以使用。不带intl的月份和日期名称仅使用英文。请注意，即使安装了intl扩展名，在32位系统上格式化年份== 2038或<= 1901的日期和时间值也将回到PHP实现中，因为intl内部使用了32位UNIX时间戳。在64位系统上，如果已安装，则在所有情况下都使用intl格式程序。

trans-unit.source: The Formatter class is designed to format values according to a $locale. For this feature to work the PHP intl extension has to be installed. Most of the methods however work also if the PHP intl extension is not installed by providing a fallback implementation. Without intl month and day names are in English only. Note that even if the intl extension is installed, formatting date and time values for years >=2038 or <=1901 on 32bit systems will fall back to the PHP implementation because intl uses a 32bit UNIX timestamp internally. On a 64bit system the intl formatter is used in all cases if installed.

trans-unit.source: The Yii class autoloader supports the class map feature, which maps class names to the corresponding class file paths. When the autoloader is loading a class, it will first check if the class is found in the map. If so, the corresponding file path will be included directly without further checks. This makes class autoloading super fast. In fact, all core Yii classes are autoloaded this way.
trans-unit.target: Yii类自动加载器支持类映射功能，该功能将类名称映射到相应的类文件路径。自动加载器加载类时，它将首先检查是否在地图中找到该类。如果是这样，将直接包含相应的文件路径，而无需进一步检查。这使得类自动加载变得非常快。实际上，所有核心Yii类都以这种方式自动加载。

This means, if YII_DEBUG is on, each log message will be appended with at most 3 levels of the call stack at which the log message is recorded; and if YII_DEBUG is off, no call stack information will be included.
trans-unit.target: 上述应用配置集TRACELEVEL为3，如果 YII_DEBUG 是上和0，如果 YII_DEBUG 关闭。这意味着，如果 YII_DEBUG ，则每个日志消息将被附加最多记录该日志消息的调用堆栈的3个级别；如果关闭了 YII_DEBUG ，则不会包含任何调用堆栈信息。

These are converted to DBMS specific type definitions dependent on the database, the table is created in. Please refer to the API documentation of the createTable()-method for more information.

trans-unit.source: The above code states that HTTP caching should be enabled for the index action only. It should generate a Last-Modified HTTP header based on the last update time of posts. When a browser visits the index page for the first time, the page will be generated on the server and sent to the browser; If the browser visits the same page again and there is no post being modified during the period, the server will not re-generate the page, and the browser will use the cached version on the client-side. As a result, server-side rendering and page content transmission are both skipped.
trans-unit.target: 上面的代码指出，仅应为 index 操作启用HTTP缓存。它应该根据帖子的最新更新时间生成一个 Last-Modified HTTP标头。当浏览器第一次访问 index 页面时，该页面将在服务器上生成并发送到浏览器；如果浏览器再次访问同一页面，并且在此期间没有任何帖子被修改，则服务器将不会重新生成该页面，并且浏览器将在客户端使用缓存的版本。结果，服务器端渲染和页面内容传输都被跳过。

trans-unit.source: The above code states that HTTP caching should be enabled for the view action only. It should generate an ETag HTTP header based on the title and content of the requested post. When a browser visits the view page for the first time, the page will be generated on the server and sent to the browser; If the browser visits the same page again and there is no change to the title and content of the post, the server will not re-generate the page, and the browser will use the cached version on the client-side. As a result, server-side rendering and page content transmission are both skipped.
trans-unit.target: 上面的代码指出应仅对 view 操作启用HTTP缓存。它应根据所请求帖子的标题和内容生成一个 ETag HTTP标头。当浏览器首次访问 view 页面时，该页面将在服务器上生成并发送到浏览器；如果浏览器再次访问同一页面，并且帖子的标题和内容没有更改，则服务器将不会重新生成页面，并且浏览器将在客户端使用缓存的版本。结果，服务器端渲染和页面内容传输都被跳过。

trans-unit.source: The above code states that page caching should be used only for the index action. The page content should be cached for at most 60 seconds and should be variated by the current application language and the cached page should be invalidated if the total number of posts is changed.
trans-unit.target: 上面的代码指出页面缓存仅应用于 index 操作。页面内容最多应缓存60秒，并且应根据当前应用程序语言而有所不同，并且如果更改了帖子总数，则缓存的页面应该无效。

trans-unit.source: The above code states that the extension depends on the jquery Bower package. In general, you can use bower-asset/PackageName to refer to a Bower package in composer.json, and use npm-asset/PackageName to refer to a NPM package. When Composer installs a Bower or NPM package, by default the package content will be installed under the @vendor/bower/PackageName and @vendor/npm/Packages directories, respectively. These two directories can also be referred to using the shorter aliases @bower/PackageName and @npm/PackageName.
trans-unit.target: 上面的代码指出扩展名取决于 jquery Bower包。通常，您可以使用 bower-asset/PackageName 引用 composer.json 中的Bower包，并使用 npm-asset/PackageName 引用NPM包。当Composer安装Bower或NPM软件包时，默认情况下，软件包内容将分别安装在 @vendor/bower/PackageName 和 @vendor/npm/Packages 目录下。也可以使用较短的别名 @bower/PackageName 和 @npm/PackageName 引用这两个目录。

trans-unit.source: The above example code uses PHP Heredoc syntax for better readability. This also enables better syntax highlighting in most IDEs so it is the preferred way of writing inline JavaScript, especially useful for code that is longer than a single line. The variable $message is created in PHP and thanks to Json::htmlEncode it contains the string in valid JS syntax, which can be inserted into the JavaScript code to place the dynamic string in the function call to alert().
trans-unit.target: 上面的示例代码使用PHP Heredoc语法来提高可读性。这还可以在大多数IDE中更好地突出显示语法，因此它是编写内联JavaScript的首选方式，特别适用于长于一行的代码。变量 $message 是用PHP创建的，感谢Json :: htmlEncode，它包含有效JS语法中的字符串，可以将其插入JavaScript代码中，以将动态字符串放入对 alert() 的函数调用中。

Without such dependency specification, the relative order between main.js and jquery.js would be undefined and the code would not work.

trans-unit.source: The column type. yii\db\QueryBuilder::getColumnType() will be called to convert the give column type to the physical one. For example, string will be converted as varchar(255), and string not null becomes varchar(255) not null.
trans-unit.target: 列类型。yii \ db \ QueryBuilder :: getColumnType（）将被调用以将给定列类型转换为物理类型。例如，将 string 转换为 varchar(255) ，而 string not null 变为 varchar(255) not null 。

trans-unit.source: The column type. The getColumnType() method will be invoked to convert abstract column type (if any) into the physical one. Anything that is not recognized as abstract type will be kept in the generated SQL. For example, 'string' will be turned into 'varchar(255)', while 'string not null' will become 'varchar(255) not null'.
trans-unit.target: 列类型。的getColumnType（）方法将被调用转换抽象列类型（如果有的话）到物理之一。任何未被识别为抽象类型的内容都将保留在生成的SQL中。例如，“字符串”将变成“ varchar（255）”，而“字符串不为空”将变成“ varchar（255）不为空”。
